## How to use this guideline 

Reporting guidelines are best used early. Read the full guideline [below](#guidance) or use a tool when working:

* Use a template to draft manuscripts and avoid the blank page
<!-- #ASK: Caroline's comment. Use a template to get your writing off to a flying start". Colloquialism?-->
* Use a log book to plan and record information whilst conducting research
* Use a checklist to double-check and reassure others that your article describes all the important details of your work
